duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and enhance applications and services using .Net, Microsoft SQL Server, C#.Net, ASP.Net, MVC, .Net Core, ASP.Net Core MVC, WCF, REST Web API, and MS CRM Dynamics.
Write unit tests with 100% coverage, build automated test scripts (ATDD), and conduct performance testing for deployment in production.
Familiarity with Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) tools like TFS or Azure DevOps.
Possess excellent communication skills, planning and organizational abilities.
Ability to establish and meet target dates, handle multiple development projects, and build strong relationships with internal and external sources.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent years of software development and testing experience required (Master's preferred)
